settings.title: Materials
settings.content:
Our moissanite rings are all handmade and crafted to perfection. They are a gorgeous alternative to mined diamonds (and way sparklier). You will get more sparkle than a diamond without having to spend a fortune.

Our stones are cut to the highest quality standards. They are completely colorless and clear. We guarantee they will amaze you with their cut, color, clarity and brilliant sparkle.

  • Stone: Ideal marquise cut moissanite gemstone
  • Stone Quality: FL, IF (internally flawless - high quality).
  • CT Size: The Extravagance Features a 3CT Marquise Cut Moissanite. We accept custom requests if you wish for a different CT size. Check the details above for specifics on this ring.
  • Band Material: Platinum Vermeil (silver color) and 18k Gold Vermeil & Solid Gold options (14k gold and white gold)
  • Fit: US Standard Fit sizes 3-13

settings.title: Size and Fit
settings.content:
All our rings are made true to U.S. standard ring sizes.

We offer a wide range of ring sizes at Awareness Avenue from size 3-13 and their half sizes. Why? Love doesn't come in single sizes and neither should your ring.

Don't know your ring size? Take your best guess and don't worry. We offer super simple paid and done for you returns & exchanges and a one-time free resizing paid for you.

settings.title: Our Gifts for You
settings.content:
A Luxury Experience When You Order Today.

With your order today you get all these additional gifts:

  • A complimentary giftbox free of charge for gifting or keepsake.
  • A velvet pouch for your ring for added protection and safekeeping.
  • Fully traceable GRA certificate for your moissanite gemstone included for free.
  • An authenticity letter for the metal of your jewelry to certify its quality.
  • Lifetime Warranty for free. We we stand behind our products.
  • Resizing guarantee included for free: Doesn't fit right? We will pay for your local jeweler resizing 1 time to make the fit & experience perfect.

settings.title: Lifetime Warranty
settings.content:
We stand behind the quality and craftsmanship of our jewelry with our lifetime warranty.

Our promise of "Ethical Jewelry, Guaranteed for Life" means every piece is crafted to be a lasting symbol of beauty and integrity.

We want you to feel confident that your jewelry will remain as stunning as the day you first wore it, now and for years to come.

settings.title: Conflict Free
settings.content:
Certified, High Quality & Ethical Production

Our rings are individually handmade, featuring moissanite gemstones – a stunning, affordable alternative to mined diamonds. They are all shipped with their original GRA certificates, so you can see exactly what you are getting and the quality of the stone.

You will never experience fading, green marks, black marks, or any other unpleasantness with our jewelry. We only use the purest & high quality materials.

  • Cut to perfection, exceptional color, cut and clarity ethically produced moissanite gemstones.
  • 100% guaranteed skin-safe and comfortable to wear all day.
  • All rings are covered by our lifetime warranty.

settings.title: Questions?
settings.content:
Emails us:

support@awareness-avenue.com

Got a custom request?

We are able to accomodate mostly anything you dream of when it comes to your jewelry. Let us know what you need at support@awareness-avenue.com and we'll get back you!
We're proud to say we've served over 250.000 customers since 2016.
